root.name: Wavelet Spot Detector Block
root.description: Wavelet Spot Detector for Blocks, to integrate in protocols.
root.author: fab - Fabrice de Chaumont
root.changelog:
- Version 0.0.1.11 Date 2017-03-10 11:37:45
Fix if no ROI is set
- Version 0.0.1.10 Date 2017-03-08 15:18:58
ROI mask fix Name field changed
- Version 0.0.1.9 Date 2017-03-08 14:35:14
Compliant 1.6
- Version 0.0.1.8 Date 2017-03-08 11:41:26
mask ROI for detection added
- Version 0.0.1.7 Date 2016-02-12 14:41:00
- fix null on copy of ROI
- Version 0.0.1.6 Date 2016-02-10 17:50:54
removed last debug output
- Version 0.0.1.5 Date 2016-02-10 17:48:05
roi output fix
- Version 0.0.1.4 Date 2016-02-10 17:43:33
fix a bug (I renamed an input this makes incompatible with previous protocols)
- Version 0.0.1.3 Date 2016-02-10 13:30:13
New: export detection to ROIs
- Version 0.0.1.2 Date 2014-05-21 17:48:16
Now support the force 2D wavelets option.
- Version 0.0.1.1 Date 2012-10-11 18:20:43
- Version 0.0.1.0 Date 2012-08-23 17:37:49
